description: Lingyang is talented and friendly member of the Liondance Troupe in Jinzhou. His passion and courage are evident as he engages with humans, showcasing his impressive physical abilities. With his unique style, he embodies the spirit of Liondancing.

descriptionLocalized.vi: Lingyang là một thành viên tài năng và thân thiện của Đoàn múa lân ở Tấn Châu. Niềm đam mê và lòng dũng cảm của anh ta thể hiện rõ ràng khi anh ta giao lưu với con người, thể hiện khả năng thể chất ấn tượng của mình. Với phong cách độc đáo của mình, anh ta thể hiện tinh thần của múa lân.
descriptionLocalized.id: Lingyang adalah anggota berbakat dan ramah dari Troupe Liondance di Jinzhou. Gairah dan keberaniannya terlihat jelas saat dia berinteraksi dengan manusia, menunjukkan kemampuan fisiknya yang mengesankan. Dengan gayanya yang unik, dia mewujudkan semangat Liondance.
descriptionLocalized.th: ลิงหยางเป็นสมาชิกที่มีความสามารถและเป็นมิตรของคณะนักแสดงสิงโตในจินโจว ความหลงใหลและความกล้าหาญของเขาปรากฏชัดเมื่อเขาสื่อสารกับมนุษย์ แสดงให้เห็นถึงความสามารถทางกายภาพที่น่าประทับใจของเขา ด้วยสไตล์ที่เป็นเอกลักษณ์ของเขา เขาเป็นตัวแทนของจิตวิญญาณของการเต้นสิงโต

quote: Awoo - Lion up! Victory is mine at this year's Greens-plucking Tournament!

quoteLocalized.vi: Awoo - Sư tử lên! Chiến thắng thuộc về ta trong giải đấu Lượm Cỏ năm nay!
quoteLocalized.id: Awoo - Singa maju! Kemenangan milikku di Turnamen Pemetik Hijau tahun ini!
quoteLocalized.th: Awoo - Singa, bersiap! Kemenangan akan menjadi milikku di Turnamen Pemetik Rumput Hijau tahun ini!

resonanceChain.name: Lion of Light, Blessings Abound
resonanceChain.description: During Resonance Liberation **Lion's Vigor**, Lingyang's Anti-Interruption is enhanced.

resonanceChain.name:
Dominant and Fierce, 
Power Unbound
resonanceChain.description: Intro Skill **Lion Awakens** additionally recovers {0} Resonance Energy for Lingyang, triggered once every {1}s.

Jaw-Dropping Feats, 
Loud and Wide
resonanceChain.description: During Resonance Liberation **Lion's Vigor**, Lingyang's Basic Attack DMG Bonus is increased by {0}, and Resonance Skill DMG Bonus increased by {1}.

resonanceChain.name:
Immortals Bow, 
in Reverence Flawed
resonanceChain.description: Outro Skill **Frosty Marks** increases the Glacio DMG Bonus of all team members by {0} for {1}s.

Seven Stars Shine, 
Stepped upon High

Demons Tremble, 
Divine Power Nigh
resonanceChain.description: In the Forte Circuit **Striding Lion** state, during the first {0}s after every Resonance Skill **Mountain Roamer**, the Basic Attack DMG Bonus for Lingyang's next Basic Attack is increased by {1}.

skills.name: Majestic Fists
skills.description:
**Basic Attack**
Lingyang performs up to 5 consecutive attacks, dealing Glacio DMG**.
 
**Basic Attack: Feral Roars**
After Resonance Skill **Furious Punches** is cast, **Basic Attack 5** is replaced with **Feral Roars**, dealing Glacio DMG**.
 
**Heavy Attack**
Lingyang consumes Stamina to attack the target, dealing Glacio DMG**.
 
**Mid-air Attack**
Lingyang consumes Stamina to perform a Mid-air Plunging Attack, dealing Glacio DMG**.
 
**Dodge Counter**
Use **Basic Attack** after a successful **Dodge** to attack the target, dealing Glacio DMG**.

skills.name: Ancient Arts
skills.description:
**Ancient Arts**
Attack the target, dealing Glacio DMG**.
 
**Furious Punches**
When **Basic Attacks 3, 4, or 5** or Basic Attack **Feral Roars** hits the target, Resonance Skill **Ancient Arts** is replaced with Resonance Skill **Swift Punches**.
If Lingyang uses **Basic Attack** after casting Basic Attack **Feral Roars** and Resonance Skill **Swift Punches**, he will start from **Basic Attack 3**.
 
Lingyang's Resonance Skill will not reset his Basic Attack stage.

skills.name: Strive: Lion's Vigor
Lion's Pride
skills.description: Damage of the Intro Skill **Lion Awakens** is increased by 50%**.

skills.name: Diligent Practice
skills.description: Under the **Striding Lion** state, within 3**s after each **Basic Attack**, the next **Mountain Roamer** will deal an additional Glacio DMG**, equal to 150%** of **Mountain Roamer** damage, considered as Resonance Skill damage.

skills.name: Lion Awakens
skills.description: Lingyang enters the battlefield, dealing Glacio DMG**.

skills.name: Unification of Spirits
skills.description:
**Heavy Attack: Glorious Plunge**
When Lion's Spirit is full, use **Heavy Attack** to perform **Glorious Plunge**, dealing Glacio DMG**.
 
**Mid-air Attack: Tail Strike**
When Lion's Spirit is not full, use **Basic Attack** after **Heavy Attack** to perform **Tail Strike**, dealing Glacio DMG**.
 
**Striding Lion**
After casting Heavy Attack **Glorious Plunge**, enter **Striding Lion** state;
After casting Intro Skill **Lion Awakens** or Resonance Liberation **Strive: Lion's Vigor**, if Lion's Spirit is full, use **Basic Attack** to enter **Striding Lion** state.
In the **Striding Lion** state:
Attacks can be launched in mid-air. If Lingyang is on the ground, use Heavy Attack **Glorious Plunge** to get back in the air.
Lion's Spirit is continuously consumed, and the **Striding Lion** state ends in 5**s after Lion's Spirit runs out;
In the Resonance Liberation **Lion's Vigor** state, the consumption speed of Lion's Spirit is reduced by 50%**, extending **Striding Lion** state by up to 10**s.
Lingyang's **Basic Attack** is replaced with Basic Attack **Feral Gyrate**, which performs up to 2 consecutive attacks, dealing Glacio DMG**.
Lingyang's **Resonance Skill** is replaced with **Mountain Roamer**, dealing Glacio DMG**.
When Lion's Spirit is less than 10**, use **Basic Attack** to perform **Stormy Kicks**, dealing Glacio DMG**; after performing Basic Attack **Stormy Kicks**, the Mid-air Attack **Radiant Plunge** becomes available.
Concerto Energy is restored when Lion's Spirit is consumed.
 
**Lion's Spirit**
Lingyang can hold up to 100** Lion's Spirit.
When casting Resonance Skill **Furious Punches**, Lion's Spirit is restored.
When casting Intro Skill **Lion Awakens**, Lion's Spirit is restored.
When casting Resonance Liberation **Strive: Lion's Vigor**, Lion's Spirit is restored.

skills.name: Skillful Cooking
skills.description: Has a chance to produce special dishes when cooking

skills.name: Frosty Marks
skills.description: Lingyang releases a shock wave centered on the skill target, dealing Glacio DMG** equal to 587.94%** of Lingyang's ATK to targets within the range.
